Rule.Name: f2013MSI
Rule.Query: $n4DigitSKUVersion='2013' and $.='MSI'

Rule.Name: n73109411026Crash
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4569.1504')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00015c8b')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='osf.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n85935812310Crash
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4609.1000')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='0000000000006d89')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='osf.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n73317526977Crash
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4609.1000')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00015fa1')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='osf.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n73260618461Crash
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4615.1000')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00015fc9')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='osf.dll')]])

Rule.Name: s3424702OsfCrashWord
Rule.Query: $n2DigitVersion=15 and ($n73109411026Crash>0 or $n85935812310Crash>0 or $n73317526977Crash>0 or $n73260618461Crash>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue when you exit Word with the Insert tab active on the Ribbon
Rule.Text: The issue where Word crashes when you exit the program with the Insert tab active has been detected {0} times. Please click the 'Click here...' link to see the most recent details on this issue.

Rule.Name: n_mrmapiCrash
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='6.1.7601.18409')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='kernelbase.dll')]])

Rule.Name: s_mrmapiCrash
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and $n_mrmapiCrash>0
Rule.Title: A known crashing issue in offcat_rts.exe was detected in the application event log
Rule.Text: A known crashing issue was detected in your application event log {0} times. This issue is fixed in Office 2013 Service Pack 1. Please click the 'Click here...' link to download Service Pack 1.

Rule.Name: nCrashIgd10umd32Word
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='igd10umd32.dll')]])

Rule.Name: sCrashIgd10umd32Word
Rule.Query: $n2DigitVersion=15 and $nCrashIgd10umd32Word>0
Rule.Title: Word crashing issue with Igd10mud32.dll found
Rule.Text:
A crashing issue in Winword.exe that was caused by Igd10umd32.dll was found {0} times in the application event log. This problem has been known to be caused by an outdated Intel graphics accelerator driver.
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for details.

Rule.Name: n3459258MsoCrashWord00003ABC
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4631.1000')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00003abc')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n3459258MsoCrashWord0000329C
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='0.0.0.0')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='0000329c')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')]])

Rule.Name: s3459258MsoCrashWordX86
Rule.Query: not($MSO_fMsoAug2014UpdateInstalled) and $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and $bitness='x86' and ($n3459258MsoCrashWord00003ABC>0 or $n3459258MsoCrashWord0000329C>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue when Word stops responding or crashes (KB 2987489)
Rule.Text: The crashing issue that occurs when Word stops responding or crashes (documented in KB 2987489) has been detected {0} time(s). Please click the 'Click here...' link to see how to resolve this issue.

Rule.Name: n3459258MsoCrashWord00000000013F766E
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='15.0.4631.1000')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00000000013f766e')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n3459258MsoCrashWord00000000013EB86E
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Version' and (Value='0.0.0.0')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00000000013eb86e')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')]])

Rule.Name: s3459258MsoCrashWordX64
Rule.Query: not($MSO_fMsoAug2014UpdateInstalled) and $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and $bitness='x64' and ($n3459258MsoCrashWord00000000013F766E>0 or $n3459258MsoCrashWord00000000013EB86E>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue when Word stops responding or crashes (KB 2987489)
Rule.Text: The crashing issue that occurs when Word stops responding or crashes (documented in KB 2987489) has been detected {0} time(s). Please click the 'Click here...' link to see how to resolve this issue.

Rule.Name: s3459258MsoCrashWordC2R
Rule.Query: not($MSO_fMsoAug2014UpdateInstalled) and $nInstallType='ClickToRun' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and ($n3459258MsoCrashWord00003ABC>0 or $n3459258MsoCrashWord0000329C>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue when Word stops responding or crashes (KB 2987489)
Rule.Text: The crashing issue that occurs when Word stops responding or crashes (documented in KB 2987489) has been detected {0} time(s). Please click the 'Click here...' link to see how to resolve this issue.

Rule.Name: n3507209Crash74072277045
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00043bbd')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='fm20.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n3507209Crash74301344235
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='00043bdf')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='fm20.dll')]])

Rule.Name: n3507209Crash120261842184
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='000000000002d892')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='fm20.dll')]])

Rule.Name: sWord15Crash3507209Msi
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and not($OfficeUpdates_sKB3023052Installed) and ($n3507209Crash74072277045>0 or $n3507209Crash74301344235>0 or $n3507209Crash120261842184>0)
Rule.Title: Known crash in Word has been detected
Rule.Text:
A Word crashing issue that is fixed by the July 14, 2015 update in KB 3023052 (and any subsequent update for FM20.dll) has been detected {0} time(s).
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for details on the July 14, 2015 update for FM20.dll and then install the {1} update from the article.

Rule.Name: sWord15Crash3507209C2R
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='ClickToRun' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and versioncompare($sFullAppVersion,'15.0.4737.1003')<0 and ($n3507209Crash74072277045>0 or $n3507209Crash74301344235>0 or $n3507209Crash120261842184>0)
Rule.Title: Known crash in Word has been detected
Rule.Text:
A Word crashing issue that is fixed by the July 14, 2015 update for Office 2013 has been detected {0} time(s).
To resolve this problem, click the 'Click here...' link and then update Office using the steps in the 'Get the latest version of Office' section of the article.

Rule.Name: sEmetMitigationWord
Rule.Title: {1} was closed by the Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit (EMET)
Rule.Text:
The Application Event log indicates the Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit forced {1} to close {0} times in the last 14 days.
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for details on this type of event.
